on_entry: /execute @s ~~~ tellraw @a {"rawtext":[{"text":"§c【炼狱泰坦】 ["},{"selector":"@s"},{"text":"] 死亡！"}]}
/execute @s[tag=游戏中] ~~~ playsound tank.death @a
/execute @s[tag=!游戏中] ~~~ playsound tank.death @a[r=32]
/stopsound tank.skill @a[r=16]
/summon coldsink:dead_final_tnnk
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage] ~~~ event entity @e[type=coldsink:dead_final_tnnk,c=1] despawn
/execute @s[tag=melee_damage,tag=melee_no_kill] ~~~ event entity @e[type=coldsink:dead_final_tnnk,c=1] despawn
/execute @s[tag=melee_damage,tag=!melee_no_kill] ~~~ tellraw @a {"rawtext":[{"text":"§b"},{"selector":"@s"},{"text":" 被近战武器杀死，本局无法复活"}]}
/execute @s[tag=melee_damage,tag=!melee_no_kill] ~~~ playsound sfzombie_killed @a
/execute @s[tag=melee_damage,tag=!melee_no_kill] ~~~ function game/dead_keep_score
/tag @s[tag=melee_no_kill] remove melee_damage
/execute @s[tag=!machine_back,tag=!melee_damage,name=忆知艾郎得晓愣沉] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie_final 忆知艾郎得晓愣沉
/execute @s[tag=!machine_back,tag=!melee_damage,name=绿画娜] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie_final 绿画娜

/execute @s[tag=!machine_back,tag=!melee_damage,name=牛腩面面] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie_final 牛腩面面
/execute @s[tag=!machine_back,tag=!melee_damage,name=蚕币] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie_final 蚕币
/execute @s[tag=!machine_back,tag=!melee_damage] ~~~ tag @e[type=coldsink:respawn_sfzombie_final,c=1] add final_tnnk_ai
/execute @s[tag=machine_back,tag=!melee_damage,name=忆知艾郎得晓愣沉] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie_big 忆知艾郎得晓愣沉
/execute @s[tag=machine_back,tag=!melee_damage,name=绿画娜] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie_big 绿画娜

/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:final_tank_ai,name=忆知艾郎得晓愣沉,c=1] game_score = @s[name=忆知艾郎得晓愣沉] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:final_tank_ai,name=绿画娜,c=1] game_score = @s[name=绿画娜] game_score

/event entity @s godie
